I'm a monster soldier!\""},{"lineNumber":33147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遊びに来たよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've come to play!\""},{"lineNumber":33148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待っ、あ、や、やめ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, s-stop...!\""},{"lineNumber":33149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ……ま、また、っ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek... a-again...\""},{"lineNumber":33150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　も、もうここに奪うモノなど……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's nothing left to steal here anymore...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひゃっほーぅ、楽しみだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yippee, I'm looking forward to this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへへへへ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騒ぐなよ……ま、俺も楽しみだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't make a fuss... well, I'm looking forward to it too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍閣下もイキな事なさるよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The General is quite the stylish one, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷を俺たちに開放なさるなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To release slaves to us, of all things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その分、戦功ポイントを取られるけどな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though he'll take the battle points from it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とほほ、俺も新しい奴隷欲しいぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah well, I want a new slave too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it good?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな上玉ども、そう競りに出ねぇよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Top-quality ones like those don't come up at auctions that often."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポイント溜めるより賢いって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's smarter than just saving up points."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それもそうか……ひひ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That makes sense... hehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はあの青髪に、鼻から精液流し込んでやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, I'm gonna pour semen into that blue-haired one's nose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はやっぱりあの緑髪かなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I think I'll go with that green-haired one after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反抗的な所を頭押さえつけるのがたまらねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Holding down that rebellious spirit by the head is irresistible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このロリコンが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You lolicon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵たちは上機嫌で、大通りを歩いて行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldiers walked down the main street in high spirits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、あれって、もしかして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, could that possibly be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……さっさといくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's move quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷えた声で呟くように口にすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muttering in a cold voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはそのまま駆け出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance took off running.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は…………い。ようこそ、おいでくださいました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... welcome, thank you for coming..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど、うぞ……お気に召した、娘を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please... take whichever daughter you like..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぎっ……あ、ぅぁ、あああぁぁぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Agh... ah, uah, aaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お…………ねぇ、さまっ……ぁっ、いぎいいいいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-mistress... ah, it hurts!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げぇっへへへへっ！　こいつらぁ重ねて犯すに限るな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehehe! It's best to violate these girls one after another!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おらぁ、動け動け！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, move, move!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あああぁぁぁっ……！　いやっ……あ、あ、あぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaaah... no... ah, ah, ah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、俺のくっせぇのを前にも後ろにもぶちこんでやる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, I'll shove my stinky thing in front and back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼻の穴にも目玉にもだ！　来い！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Into their nostrils and their eyeballs too! Come on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだ、やめっ……も、もう、許して、っ…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, stop... p-please forgive me...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっふふ。ま、払った分は楽しむが良い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fufufu. Well, enjoy what you paid for."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが壊すなよ？　壊す時も、私がやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But don't break them, okay? Even if you break them, I'll be the one to do it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――――そこには、筆舌に尽くしがたい、狂宴があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ――――There was an indescribable, frenzied orgy there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むせ返るような匂い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An overwhelming stench.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣き叫ぶ声。それすら……もうできなくなった声。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Screams and cries. Voices that couldn't even cry out anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁあッ、ぅ、あッ……が、ッ……ああああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaah, u, aaah... gah... aaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇー。こいつ、もうぶっ壊れてんじゃねーっすか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Jeez. This one’s already broken, isn’t she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、そこの斧取ってくれよ。ケツに柄でもねじ込めば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, grab that axe over there. If you shove the handle into her ass..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだお前。人間……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What are you? A human...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、物も言わずに激発した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance exploded into action without speaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊はマリア達を救出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon extermination squad rescued Maria and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辛くも城に帰還した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and barely made it back to the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その村は、既に滅んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That village had already been destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼かれ、略奪の限りを尽くされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Burned and looted to the fullest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守れるような者は皆殺しにされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All who could have defended it were slaughtered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもわずかな生き残りが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, a few survivors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僅かに夜露を凌げるよう、肩を寄せ合っていた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: huddled together, barely sheltered from the night dew...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけの場所だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was all that place was.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、ひいいいいぃぃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek, eeeeeek!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、魔物兵だ！！　また魔物兵が来たあぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's the monster soldiers!! The monster soldiers have come again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁい！　僕ちゃん魔物兵！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hi there! I'm a monster soldier!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊びに来たよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We've come to play!"
"W-wait, s-stop...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ……ま、また、っ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek... a-again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: も、もうここに奪うモノなど……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's nothing left to steal here anymore...!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

A human...?\""},{"lineNumber":33133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――――……ッ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"--------...!\""},{"lineNumber":33134,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは、物も言わずに激発した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance exploded into action without speaking."},{"lineNumber":33135,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人討伐隊はマリア達を救出し、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon extermination squad rescued Maria and the others,"},{"lineNumber":33136,"originalJapaneseLine":"辛くも城に帰還した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and barely made it back to the castle."},{"lineNumber":33137,"originalJapaneseLine":"その村は、既に滅んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"That village had already been destroyed."},{"lineNumber":33138,"originalJapaneseLine":"焼かれ、略奪の限りを尽くされ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Burned and looted to the fullest,"},{"lineNumber":33139,"originalJapaneseLine":"守れるような者は皆殺しにされた。","translatedEnglishLine":"All who could have defended it were slaughtered."},{"lineNumber":33140,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでもわずかな生き残りが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Still, a few survivors,"},{"lineNumber":33141,"originalJapaneseLine":"僅かに夜露を凌げるよう、肩を寄せ合っていた……","translatedEnglishLine":"huddled together, barely sheltered from the night dew..."},{"lineNumber":33142,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけの場所だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"That was all that place was."},{"lineNumber":33143,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが――――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then――――"},{"lineNumber":33144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ、ひいいいいぃぃ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek, eeeeeek!\""},{"lineNumber":33145,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、魔物兵だ！！　また魔物兵が来たあぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it's the monster soldiers!! The monster soldiers have come again!\""},{"lineNumber":33146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁい！　僕ちゃん魔物兵！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hi there! I'm a monster soldier!\""},{"lineNumber":33147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遊びに来たよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've come to play!\""},{"lineNumber":33148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待っ、あ、や、やめ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, s-stop...!\""},{"lineNumber":33149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ……ま、また、っ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek... a-again...\""},{"lineNumber":33150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　も、もうここに奪うモノなど……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's nothing left to steal here anymore...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひゃっほーぅ、楽しみだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yippee, I'm looking forward to this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへへへへ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騒ぐなよ……ま、俺も楽しみだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't make a fuss... well, I'm looking forward to it too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍閣下もイキな事なさるよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The General is quite the stylish one, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷を俺たちに開放なさるなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To release slaves to us, of all things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その分、戦功ポイントを取られるけどな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though he'll take the battle points from it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とほほ、俺も新しい奴隷欲しいぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah well, I want a new slave too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it good?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな上玉ども、そう競りに出ねぇよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Top-quality ones like those don't come up at auctions that often."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポイント溜めるより賢いって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's smarter than just saving up points."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それもそうか……ひひ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That makes sense... hehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はあの青髪に、鼻から精液流し込んでやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, I'm gonna pour semen into that blue-haired one's nose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はやっぱりあの緑髪かなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I think I'll go with that green-haired one after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反抗的な所を頭押さえつけるのがたまらねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Holding down that rebellious spirit by the head is irresistible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このロリコンが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You lolicon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵たちは上機嫌で、大通りを歩いて行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldiers walked down the main street in high spirits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、あれって、もしかして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, could that possibly be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……さっさといくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's move quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷えた声で呟くように口にすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muttering in a cold voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはそのまま駆け出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance took off running.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は…………い。ようこそ、おいでくださいました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... welcome, thank you for coming..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど、うぞ……お気に召した、娘を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please... take whichever daughter you like..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぎっ……あ、ぅぁ、あああぁぁぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Agh... ah, uah, aaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お…………ねぇ、さまっ……ぁっ、いぎいいいいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-mistress... ah, it hurts!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げぇっへへへへっ！　こいつらぁ重ねて犯すに限るな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehehehe! It's best to violate these girls one after another!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おらぁ、動け動け！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, move, move!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あああぁぁぁっ……！　いやっ……あ、あ、あぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaaah... no... ah, ah, ah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、俺のくっせぇのを前にも後ろにもぶちこんでやる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, I'll shove my stinky thing in front and back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼻の穴にも目玉にもだ！　来い！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Into their nostrils and their eyeballs too! Come on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだ、やめっ……も、もう、許して、っ…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, stop... p-please forgive me...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっふふ。ま、払った分は楽しむが良い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fufufu. Well, enjoy what you paid for."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが壊すなよ？　壊す時も、私がやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But don't break them, okay? Even if you break them, I'll be the one to do it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――――そこには、筆舌に尽くしがたい、狂宴があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ――――There was an indescribable, frenzied orgy there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むせ返るような匂い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An overwhelming stench.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣き叫ぶ声。それすら……もうできなくなった声。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Screams and cries. Voices that couldn't even cry out anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁあッ、ぅ、あッ……が、ッ……ああああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaah, u, aaah... gah... aaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇー。こいつ、もうぶっ壊れてんじゃねーっすか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Jeez. This one’s already broken, isn’t she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、そこの斧取ってくれよ。ケツに柄でもねじ込めば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, grab that axe over there. If you shove the handle into her ass..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだお前。人間……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What are you? A human...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、物も言わずに激発した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance exploded into action without speaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊はマリア達を救出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon extermination squad rescued Maria and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辛くも城に帰還した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and barely made it back to the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その村は、既に滅んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That village had already been destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼かれ、略奪の限りを尽くされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Burned and looted to the fullest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守れるような者は皆殺しにされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All who could have defended it were slaughtered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもわずかな生き残りが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, a few survivors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僅かに夜露を凌げるよう、肩を寄せ合っていた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: huddled together, barely sheltered from the night dew...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけの場所だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was all that place was.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、ひいいいいぃぃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek, eeeeeek!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、魔物兵だ！！　また魔物兵が来たあぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's the monster soldiers!! The monster soldiers have come again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁい！　僕ちゃん魔物兵！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hi there! I'm a monster soldier!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊びに来たよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We've come to play!"
"W-wait, s-stop...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ……ま、また、っ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek... a-again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: も、もうここに奪うモノなど……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's nothing left to steal here anymore...!"
